awakeningSkills.bonusNotes: Ignores Wrath damage by percentage of stagger threshold raised

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Vibration] Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional [Vibration] Count

data.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self
data.name: Regret

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Vibration] Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional [Vibration] Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]
If target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon [VibrationExplosion],
Deal Wrath Damage by (6 + 2x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised

Deal Wrath Damage by (12 + 3x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised.

corrosionSkills.bonusNotes: Ignores Wrath damage by percentage of stagger threshold raised

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion].
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by [VibrationExplosion] increases by 30% of [Vibration] on target.
Reduce [Vibration] Count by 1
